Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1,1,0,0,-1).
formula: a(n+12) = a(n) + 1. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 09 2009]G.f.: 1/( (1-x)^2*(1+x)*(1+x+x^2)*(1+x^2)). [_R. J. Mathar_, Feb 13 2009]a(n) = 1+floor(n/3)+floor(-n/4). - _Tani Akinari_, Sep 02 2013
